overview: Head Above Water 守卫者-浮出水面 is a 30-episode Chinese spy drama starring Jin Dong (The First Half of My Life) and Han Yuqin. I don't know if anyone's keeping count but this makes Jin Dong's fifth drama throughout the course of the year where he's been a surgeon, a businessman, a loving father and now, a spy. I mean talk about an actor with incredible range.
title: Head above water
